named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_FIELDS_BY_PAGE_ID
named-query.query: SELECT pageField FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageField pageField LEFT JOIN FETCH pageField.fieldDataList WHERE pageField.page = :page

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_FOLDER_CHILD_FOLDERS
named-query.query: SELECT pageFolder FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageFolder pageFolder WHERE pageFolder.parentFolder = :parentFolder AND pageFolder.folderFlag = true AND pageFolder.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_NULL_PAGE_FOLDER_CHILD_FOLDERS
named-query.query: SELECT pageFolder FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageFolder pageFolder WHERE pageFolder.parentFolder is null AND pageFolder.folderFlag = true AND pageFolder.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_FOLDER_CHILD_PAGES
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page LEFT JOIN page.pageTemplate pageTemplate WHERE page.parentFolder = :parentFolder AND (pageTemplate.locale.localeCode = :localeCode OR pageTemplate.locale.localeCode is null) AND (page.sandbox = :userSandbox OR page.sandbox = :productionSandbox OR page.sandbox is null OR page.originalSandBox = :userSandbox) AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_NULL_PAGE_FOLDER_CHILD_PAGES
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page LEFT JOIN page.pageTemplate pageTemplate WHERE page.parentFolder is null AND (pageTemplate.locale.localeCode = :localeCode OR pageTemplate.locale.localeCode is null) AND (page.sandbox = :userSandbox OR page.sandbox = :productionSandbox OR page.sandbox is null OR page.originalSandBox = :userSandbox) AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_TEMPLATES_FOR_DEFAULT_LOCALE
named-query.query: SELECT pageTemplate FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageTemplate pageTemplate WHERE pageTemplate.locale.defaultFlag = true

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_BY_URI
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page WHERE page.fullUrl = :uri AND page.sandbox is null AND page.pageTemplate.locale = :locale AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_BY_URI_AND_PRODUCTION_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page WHERE page.fullUrl = :uri AND page.sandbox = :sandbox AND page.pageTemplate.locale = :locale AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_BY_URI_AND_USER_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page WHERE page.fullUrl = :uri AND page.pageTemplate.locale = :locale AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false AND page.id in (SELECT sandboxItem.temporaryItemId FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE (sandboxItem.originalSandBox = :sandbox OR sandboxItem.sandBox = :sandbox) AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = false AND sandboxItem.temporaryItemId = page.id)
